timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we need to create some sort of ordering mechanism so like some file manipulation extension can run after a framework extension has populated all the file?
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: Good idea. In a follow-up PR, I'll add a new extension configuration option, as I proposed in the internal doc. I think I will be able to enforce ordering with it.
replies.author: chanseokoh
